website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for fit, with an adjustable wrist strap.
pros: Wicking material along the back side keeps hands cool and dry
Sectional padding design provides protection but still allows hand to move freely
Molded rubber tab and hook and loop closure for secure fit
Offered in 2 color options: black and white
cons: At 1 pound, these are the heaviest gloves on our list

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Not well made. When you get them ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Not well made. When you get them turn them inside out right away and check the stitching. My son wore them in just a couple games and the thumb became completely undone. In trying to make the repair ourselves we noticed more shoddy stitching that had to be tightened up. I shouldn't have to re-sew football gloves that are described as "tough." Make sure you check them thoroughly before using so you can return them if need be, because we didn't note the problem until them came completely undone.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA DEPRIEST

customer_reviews.title: Protection for hands
customer_reviews.text: I just received these gloves today! I bought them because my hands were constantly taking hits when I ran the ball (which made them super sore after practice). They are a perfect fit and the protection is covering the right spots!
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Tough Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what I was looking for when I started but these are perfect for my lineman! He wanted something to keep his hands dry and warm while playing in the cold mountain air. Very tough have lasted through several games and even been thrown in the washing machine (pull them out and air dry). These are great the only down side is he does sweat in them a lot during the warmer games. I think he will be happy to have them come November!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Van Dine

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review, and never send products back. I'm doing both with these gloves. Very unhappy with the quality, especially at this high price point. My 11 year old son (plays center and nose) used them 3 practices and one game, and the stitching is coming out of the seams. He liked them, and said they worked well, but are really low quality gloves with a cost that suggest the opposite. No $45 gloves should fall apart after 8 hours use. Not happy with the lineman glove selection, the cost, or the reviews they're getting. Save your money and your time on these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for linemen
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my youngest’s first year of HS football, seemed like a better idea than a small pad and a little tape. Size ran true, works well for O & D linemen. Can be washed
customer_reviews.author: ricknjill

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lineman gloves.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will protect my sons hands during football season. If anything changes, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: YO

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: They seem great ordered Adult Medium-sized my son is 12 but is about 5' 3" 155 lbs, and there is a slight about 1/4 to 3/8 of an inch room on end of fingers. I (father) tried them on 5'9" and they stretch nicely. They look thicker on line but still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kattie O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves! These really saved my hands and fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves! These really saved my hands and fingers on the field and looked awesome. Still looked good after a couple games and practices!1
customer_reviews.author: Heliodoro

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these for 3 weeks of practice and 3 games. They seam on left thumb slit and the fingertips are wearing away. I thought they would be better. He plays left guard,in high school with big hands. The size worked well but the construction needs re-enforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My son swears by these gloves. He says he ...
customer_reviews.text: My son swears by these gloves. He says he can hit harder and without fear of skinning his fingers on his opponents jersey. Must have for the lineman in your life!
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Moran

product_meta.title: adidas Techfit Lineman Football Gloves
product_meta.description: Adidas TECHFIT Lineman Adult Gloves have Flex-pad construction which provides excellent coverage over "high strike" areas on the back of hand without sacrificing flex or range of motion. Wicking compression back breathes, cooling hand during intense competition. adidas Grip Tack palm gives sure grip control, with lasting durability. Base of palm "jam padding" adds protection where its needed.
feature_bullets: The back of the hand is a unique combination of performance grade lycra and breathable mesh, molded into sectional padding
Part of the palm is heavy duty synthetic leather, the rest is Grip Tack which provides enhanced grip in all playing conditions
Specific impact jam pad at the base of palm provides comfort and protection
The wrist band has a heavy duty elastic wrist closure and combines comfort and functionality
The closure has a molded rubber tab with low profile Velcro to provide a secure fit
